website_summaries.verdict: Baby-to-toddler mat that features a jolly green frog, along with a soft surface, ball racing track, and removable hanging toys.
pros: Easy to assemble and very sturdy
perfect for parents who don't want to hear the same tune all day long
Balls can be stored inside frog if babies aren't able to play with them yet
Can fold it flat to transport
cons: Balls might be a bit flimsy for stronger babies who like to squash things
While some adults are happy there’s no music, others prefer it

customer_reviews.title: Great to grow with baby
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for baby into toddler years! Only complaint is the balls are a little flimsy so they crush when my baby grabs and chews them. Only suggestion would be to secure the bottom mat to the unit itself because the string attached to the mat is not tight enough to hold it securely (I actually attached it with some small zip ties.) Love bright colors and the toys are cute, mine loves the mirror. Can’t wait to see her continue to play with this as she gets bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Occupies child's time
customer_reviews.text: Took maybe 10 minutes to assemble. Love that it grows with the child and has multi function. Bright colors and my infant loves it.
customer_reviews.author: tanya s

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this & I like that he can continue to use it as he grows. I would rebuy. He's not old enough to play with the balls but they are stored in the frog. Convenient! Also others that I looked at didn't fold like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: Works great, both of my girls love to play with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, both of my girls love to play with it.. my 8 month old just started sitting up under it and loves to watch my two year old play around her with the balls
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy For A Sitting Baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy for our 8-month old. She's just started sitting and likes to sit at this toy and play with the toys hanging from it. The toy comes in a few pieces: The main "frog eyes" and then the two arms which just snap in. The yellow track is snapped together in two pieces and then snaps to the frog. The yellow track doesn't stay together great and doesn't stay attached to the frog well either. But it doesn't really matter - she still has fun. The balls go in the frog and roll down and around the track. The toy also folds flat. We've used this feature to take it in the car to the grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever, if you have more than one kid just get it!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of the best things I've ever purchased. 18-36 months? Nope, try every age! I have a one month old, 22 month old, and 6 year old who all love playing with it. Nieces and nephews love it too. We use to have a cat and I bet he would have loved it too. For moms with lots of kids, this is a life saver when you need to get lunch made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This is so adorable and fun to play with. Assembly was easy, follow the directions and you easy put it together. The balls are so cute and fun to play with for the little ones. The frog takes them in and they go around the track. The toys are cute and easy to get to and play with. This is steady and doesn't tip even if tugged on. The little mat is easy to wash. It does have the ability to be made into a toy for older babies too.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Assembly a snap, fun and engaging mat
customer_reviews.text: My baby nephew has been using this for months. He is now 8 months old and still likes using it. The assembly was a snap, literally it snapped together. The items hanging above have provided lots of entertainment and tactile stimulation. Now that he is starting to stand (with help), he really enjoys putting the balls on the top and seeing them come down the sides. The mat is very easy to clean. This toy has grown with him and I think he will get more use of it in the months to come.
customer_reviews.author: skywatcher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and with great play value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice toy. It is sturdy, colorful, and with several play activities. It is designed so it can be used from a few weeks to three years, and it is even easy to clean. Baby can use it lying down, sitting, or standing. It should help with such things as hand eye coordination. The separate mat is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Baby's Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! My 10 month old has been playing with this since he was 2 months old, and it's still his favorite. Like, it's early January and this is still more interesting than his Christmas presents. Wipes clean easily, the balls are just the right size for baby hands, and it's easy to assemble. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: EHunt3946

customer_reviews.title: Fun for baby through toddler
customer_reviews.text: I love that this toy is usable for more than just immobile infants. Its easy to set up, easy to clean and both my baby and my toddler can play with this either together or separately. The hanging toy grab baby's attention and the ball play is fun for the toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

product_meta.title: Infantino Great Leaps Gym and Ball Roller Coaster, Green
product_meta.description: Great Leaps Gym and Ball Roller Coaster is an Adaptive gym design entertains your tiny tadpoles through toddlerhood with its overhead play, tummy time encouragement, seated activates and stand up fun.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
